Understanding Your Results

Your body composition results provide valuable insights into your overall fitness and health status:

  • Body Fat Percentage: Indicates the proportion of fat mass to total body mass.
  • Muscle Mass Index (MMI): Measures your relative muscle mass accounting for height.
  • Waist-to-Hip Ratio: An indicator of fat distribution and metabolic health risk.

Tips for Accuracy

  • Measure first thing in the morning before eating or drinking
  • Use a flexible tape measure and keep it parallel to the floor
  • Take measurements without clothing that could affect accuracy
  • For waist measurement, measure at the narrowest point
  • For hip measurement, measure at the widest point
